courses.title: Beginner Guitar Lessons
courses.description: Learn the basics of guitar playing, including chords, strumming patterns, and simple songs.

courses.title: Advanced Piano Techniques
courses.description: Master advanced piano techniques, including improvisation, jazz scales, and complex compositions.

courses.title: Vocal Training for Singers
courses.description: Improve your singing skills with professional vocal training, breathing exercises, and performance tips.

courses.title: Drumming for Beginners
courses.description: Start your journey in drumming with our beginner's course, covering basic rhythms, techniques, and coordination exercises.

courses.title: Jazz Improvisation
courses.description: Learn the art of jazz improvisation, including scales, chord progressions, and soloing techniques.

courses.title: Classical Violin Mastery
courses.description: Advance your violin skills with a focus on classical repertoire, technique, and performance.

courses.title: Electronic Music Production
courses.description: Explore the world of electronic music production, including DAW usage, sound design, and mixing techniques.

courses.title: Songwriting 101
courses.description: Learn the fundamentals of songwriting, including melody, harmony, lyrics, and song structure.

courses.title: Music Theory for Beginners
courses.description: Understand the basics of music theory, including scales, chords, rhythm, and notation.
